code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{LineChart,Line,XAxis,YAxis,CartesianGrid,Tooltip,Legend,ResponsiveContainer}from'recharts';import'./PlotGraph.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PlotGraph(){const[xData,setXData]=useState('');const[yData,setYData]=useState('');const[data,setData]=useState([]);const handlePlot=()=>{const xValues=xData.split(',').map(Number);const yValues=yData.split(',').map(Number);if(xValues.length!==yValues.length){alert('X-axis and Y-axis data must have the same length');return;}const plotData=xValues.map((x,i)=>({x,y:yValues[i]}));setData(plotData);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"plot-graph",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-center",children:"Plot Graph"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"form-label",children:"Enter X-axis data (comma separated):"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",value:xData,onChange:e=>setXData(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"form-label",children:"Enter Y-axis data (comma separated):"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",value:yData,onChange:e=>setYData(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",onClick:handlePlot,children:"Plot"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chart-container mt-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResponsiveContainer,{width:"100%",height:400,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(LineChart,{data:data,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartesianGrid,{strokeDasharray:"3 3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XAxis,{dataKey:"x"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YAxis,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Legend,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{type:"monotone",dataKey:"y",stroke:"#8884d8",activeDot:{r:8}})]})})})]});}export default PlotGraph;
